title: GET_PED_PROP_TEXTURE_INDEX
content:
0xE131A28626F81AB20x922A6653// GetPedPropTextureIndex
int GET_PED_PROP_TEXTURE_INDEX(Ped ped, int componentId);Parameters:ped: The ped handle.componentId: The component id to get the prop texture index from. Refer to SET_PED_COMPONENT_VARIATION.
codeBlocks:
// GetPedPropTextureIndex
int GET_PED_PROP_TEXTURE_INDEX(Ped ped, int componentId);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for GET_PED_PROP_TEXTURE_INDEX
GetPedPropTextureIndex(ped, 0)
